${ModID}:VoicesInYourHead.NAME: Voices in Your Head
${ModID}:VoicesInYourHead.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !M! turn{!M!|>1=s} of Weak and Vulnerable to all enemies and steal !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal #b%d turn{!M!|>1=s} of #pWeak and #rVulnerable to all enemies and steal #b%d #yTemporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:TinyWish.NAME: Tiny Wish
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #b%d #yAliemus.

${ModID}:AMousesWisdom.NAME: A Mouse's Wisdom
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #b%d [E].

${ModID}:EncounterInPureWhite.NAME: Encounter in Pure White
${ModID}:EncounterInPureWhite.DESCRIPTION: Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards +2.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards #b+2.

${ModID}:WardedInjection.NAME: Warded Injection
${ModID}:WardedInjection.DESCRIPTION: Gain 10 Block. If current HP is below 25%, restore 10 HP.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #b10 #yBlock. If current HP is below #b25%, restore #b10 HP.

${ModID}:ObsessionEternal.NAME: Obsession Eternal
${ModID}:ObsessionEternal.DESCRIPTION: Gain 3 Strength, and gain an additional ${ModID}:Temporary Strength equal to 25% of your ${ModID}:Permanent_Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain #b3 #yStrength, and gain an additional #yTemporary #yStrength equal to #b25% of your #yPermanent #yStrength.

${ModID}:TheLoneSeed.NAME: The Lone Seed
${ModID}:TheLoneSeed.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 ${ModID}:Command_Card from your hand, obtain 1 Base Copy with Exhaust added, and grant 15 ${ModID}:Aliemus.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose #b1 #yCommand #yCard from your hand, obtain #b1 Base Copy with #yExhaust added, and grant #b15 #yAliemus.

${ModID}:TheGatedAnswer.NAME: The Gated Answer
${ModID}:TheGatedAnswer.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from 3 random ${ModID}:Posse, trigger its effect and gain 200 ${ModID}:Keyflare.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose #b1 from #b3 random #yPosse, trigger its effect and gain #b200 #yKeyflare.

${ModID}:UnequalExchange.NAME: Unequal Exchange
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw #b4 cards.

${ModID}:EphemeralEternity.NAME: Ephemeral Eternity
${ModID}:EphemeralEternity.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. Place 1 Base Copy of "Strike" and 1 Base Copy of "Defend" into hand, and grants then Exhaust, Ethereal. NL If the current Realm is ${ModID}:Ultra, gain an additional 2 ${ModID}:Temporary Strength and 1 ${ModID}:Temporary Dexterity.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. Place #b1 Base Copy of "Strike" and #b1 Base Copy of "Defend" into hand, and grants then #yExhaust, #yEthereal. NL If the current Realm is #pUltra, gain an additional #b2 #yTemporary #yStrength and #b1 #yTemporary #yDexterity.

${ModID}:GatewayOfRetrospection.NAME: Gateway of Retrospection
${ModID}:GatewayOfRetrospection.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 card from the Draw Pile to move to your hand, and reduce the [E] Cost by 1.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Choose #b1 card from the Draw Pile to move to your hand, and reduce the [E] Cost by #b1.

${ModID}:AGunsCry.NAME: A Gun's Cry
${ModID}:AGunsCry.DESCRIPTION: Place 1 "Shining Octahedron Dice" in your hand, gain 1 ${ModID}:Temporary Strength.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Place #b1 "Shining Octahedron Dice" in your hand, gain #b1 #yTemporary #yStrength.

${ModID}:FestivalOfTides.NAME: Festival of Tides
${ModID}:FestivalOfTides.DESCRIPTION: Draw 2 cards, gain 2 [E] , lose 5 ${ModID}:Aliemus. If currently in the ${ModID}:Tranquil_Sea stance, inflict 5 Poison on all enemies, with 3 times the effect in Boss Battles.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Draw #b2 cards, gain #b2 [E] , lose #b5 #yAliemus. If currently in the #bTranquil #bSea stance, inflict #b5 #pPoison on all enemies, with #b3 times the effect in Boss Battles.

${ModID}:Strike_RamonaTimeworm.NAME: Strike
${ModID}:Strike_RamonaTimeworm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL ${ModID}:Loop: Deal damage !M! additional time{!M!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:Defend_RamonaTimeworm.NAME: Defend
${ModID}:Defend_RamonaTimeworm.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block. NL Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL ${ModID}:Loop: All enemies -!M! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength, draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}, gain an additional !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Aliemus.

${ModID}:FirstDoctrine.NAME: First Doctrine
${ModID}:FirstDoctrine.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL After playing a card, gain !M! [E]. Up to !${ModID}:M2! times per turn.

${ModID}:AssaultThesis.NAME: Assault Thesis
${ModID}:AssaultThesis.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}All enemies ${ModID}:Temporarily reduce !M! Strength. Draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}. For each [E] Cost of the drawn card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}, gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Keyflare.

${ModID}:QueensSword.NAME: Queen's Sword
${ModID}:QueensSword.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:M2! times. After playing, increase the number of damage for "Queen's Sword" by 1, up to 6 times. ${ModID}:Aftershock: gain ${ModID}:Keyflare equal to playing this card.
${ModID}:QueensSword.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:M2! times, gain !${ModID}:M3! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength after each time damage is dealt. After playing, increase the number of damage for "Queen's Sword" by 1, up to 6 times. ${ModID}:Aftershock: gain ${ModID}:Keyflare equal to playing this card.

${ModID}:EchoedSimulation.NAME: 模擬演繹
${ModID}:EchoedSimulation.DESCRIPTION: 在手牌中時, 視為本回合上次打出的 ${ModID}:指令卡.

${ModID}:FleshDetached.NAME: Flesh Detached
${ModID}:FleshDetached.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL When perform healing, gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:OuterSurgery.NAME: Outer Surgery
${ModID}:OuterSurgery.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Heal !${ModID}:H! HP. Inflict all enemies with !M! stack{!M!|>1=s} of Weak.

${ModID}:EquivalentExchange.NAME: Equivalent Exchange
${ModID}:EquivalentExchange.DESCRIPTION: Heal !${ModID}:H! HP. Discard all cards in hand. For each card discarded, heal an additional !M! HP and gain the same amount of Block.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Heal !${ModID}:H! HP and gain !B! Block. Discard all cards in hand.

${ModID}:PhysiologicalAnalysis.NAME: 生理剖析
${ModID}:PhysiologicalAnalysis.DESCRIPTION: 使自身所有負面狀態減少 !M! 層.

${ModID}:BattleThirst.NAME: Battle Thirst
${ModID}:BattleThirst.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL The number of times ${ModID}:Command_Cards deal damage increases by !M!.

${ModID}:BladeOfDefiance.NAME: Blade of Defiance
${ModID}:BladeOfDefiance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy, repeat !${ModID}:AC! times. Each Strike played this turn, reduces [E] Cost by 1. NL Counts as Strike.

${ModID}:TidesOfHubris.NAME: Tides of Hubris
${ModID}:TidesOfHubris.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies, gain !M! Strength. NL Counts as Strike.

${ModID}:LoopingSwordplay.NAME: Looping Swordplay
${ModID}:LoopingSwordplay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, permanently increase this card's damage by !M! and place a copy of this card into hand. NL Counts as Strike.

${ModID}:KnightsZeal.NAME: Knight's Zeal
${ModID}:KnightsZeal.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL Gain !M! Strength, After playing each !${ModID}:M3! ${ModID}:Command_Card{!${ModID}:M3!|>1=s}, gain !${ModID}:M2! Strength.

${ModID}:UnstableBarrier.NAME: Unstable Barrier
${ModID}:UnstableBarrier.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !B! Block X+1 times. Gain ${ModID}:Aliemus equal to !${ModID}:A! time{!${ModID}:A!|>1=s} of X. Gain !M! Strength.

${ModID}:PiercingStrike.NAME: Piercing Spear
${ModID}:PiercingStrike.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !D! ${ModID}:Pierce_Damage, inflict !M! turn{!M!|>1=s} of Vulnerable, Strength affects this card !${ModID}:M2! times.

${ModID}:EntropyUndone.NAME: Entropy Undone
${ModID}:EntropyUndone.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL Gain !M! ${ModID}:Keyflare after playing a ${ModID}:Command_Card, up to !${ModID}:M2! times per turn. When a card with ${ModID}:Loop effect is played but not triggered, gain !${ModID}:M3! stack{!${ModID}:M3!|>1=s} of ${ModID}:Negentropy.

${ModID}:PredeterminedStrike.NAME: Predetermined Sword
${ModID}:PredeterminedStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, Strength affects this card !M! times. Each time a ${ModID}:Posse is released, Strength multiplier on this card +1 in this battle. ${ModID}:Loop: Choose "Rebirth Tribunal" or "Ode to Tomorrow". NL "Rebirth Tribunal": Gain !${ModID}:M2! [E]. NL "Ode to Tomorrow": Deal double damage and gain !${ModID}:M3! times the ${ModID}:Keyflare, but Exhaust after playing.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Rebirth Tribunal
Gain !${ModID}:M2! [E].
Ode to Tomorrow
Deal double damage and gain !${ModID}:M3! times the ${ModID}:Keyflare, but Exhaust after playing.

${ModID}:SightUnbound.NAME: Sight Unbound
${ModID}:SightUnbound.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !M! Strength, Choose !${ModID}:M2! card{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} from Draw Pile and move it to your hand, reducing its [E] Cost by !${ModID}:M3!. ${ModID}:Loop: Instead, choose !${ModID}:M2! card{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} from Draw Pile or Discard Pile and move it to your hand, setting its [E] Cost to 0.

${ModID}:RealityImitation.NAME: 現實模仿
${ModID}:RealityImitation.DESCRIPTION: 查看隨機 !M! 張 ${ModID}:指令卡 , 將一張附加 消耗 且 [E] 消耗為 0 的原始複製置入手中.

${ModID}:Soulblight.NAME: Soulblight
${ModID}:Soulblight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL When turn ends, heal !${ModID}:H! HP and gain ${ModID}:Aliemus equal to own ${ModID}:Aliemus_Regen. NL ${ModID}:Stance_of_The_End: No longer heal HP, instead trigger !M!% Poison on all enemies.

${ModID}:SelfDestruct.NAME: Self-Destruct
${ModID}:SelfDestruct.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Choose "Elation" or "Curse". NL "Elation": Inflict !M! turn{!M!|>1=s} of Vulnerable to all enemies, gain !${ModID}:M2! turn{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of ${ModID}:Elation. NL "Curse": Inflict Weak to all enemies for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}, and decrease their Strength by !${ModID}:M3! this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Elation
{@@}Inflict !M! turn{!M!|>1=s} of Vulnerable to all enemies, gain !${ModID}:M2! turn{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of ${ModID}:Elation.
Curse
{@@}Inflict Weak to all enemies for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}, and decrease their Strength by !${ModID}:M3! this turn.
Self-Destruct: The End

{@@}Max HP reduce by !${ModID}:M4!, Trigger the "Elation" and "Curse" effects. NL Elation: Inflict !M! turn{!M!|>1=s} of Vulnerable to all enemies, gain !${ModID}:M2! turn{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of ${ModID}:Elation. NL Curse: Inflict Weak to all enemies for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}, and decrease their Strength by !${ModID}:M3! this turn.

${ModID}:FatesDescent.NAME: Fate's Descent
${ModID}:FatesDescent.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Heal !${ModID}:H! HP, and heal an additional time for every !M! ${ModID}:Aliemus currently possessed.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Fate's Descent: The End
{@@}Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Inflict !${ModID}:M2! stack{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of Poison to all enemies. For every !M! ${ModID}:Aliemus currently possessed, apply Poison an additional time.

${ModID}:GeniusForesight.NAME: Genius' Foresight
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Energy
Gain !M! [E].
Draw
{@@}Draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:DrowningInSorrow.NAME: Drowning in Sorrow
${ModID}:DrowningInSorrow.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL After turn starts, apply !M! Poison to all creatures, then gain ${ModID}:Aliemus equal to !${ModID}:M2! times the number of Poison stacks on yourself. You can block Poison damage.

${ModID}:MidnightTide.NAME: Midnight Tide
${ModID}:MidnightTide.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the highest HP and apply Poison equal to !M!% of the damage. Strength affects !${ModID}:M2! times on this card.

${ModID}:KnellOfDeath.NAME: Knell of Death
${ModID}:KnellOfDeath.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Inflict !M! stack{!M!|>1=s} of Poison on all enemies, increased by !${ModID}:M2! times your Poison stacks. Apply Weak and Vulnerable for !${ModID}:M3! turn{!${ModID}:M3!|>1=s}.
${ModID}:KnellOfDeath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Inflict !M! stack{!M!|>1=s} of Poison on all enemies, increased by !${ModID}:M2! times your Poison stacks. Apply Weak and Vulnerable for !${ModID}:M3! turn{!${ModID}:M3!|>1=s}. Gain !B! Block.

${ModID}:ToxicMiasma.NAME: Toxic Miasma
${ModID}:ToxicMiasma.DESCRIPTION: Doubles the Poison of all enemies. Adds !M! "Suffocation" into your hand.

${ModID}:MaintenanceExpert.NAME: Maintenance Expert
${ModID}:MaintenanceExpert.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL 造成的 Block 和 Thorns 提高 !M! %.

${ModID}:NoTrespassing.NAME: No Trespassing
${ModID}:NoTrespassing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and !M! ${ModID}:Temporary Thorns, In Boss Battle, gain !${ModID}:M2! times of ${ModID}:Temporary Thorns. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.

${ModID}:ArtisanOfFate.NAME: 命運工匠
${ModID}:ArtisanOfFate.DESCRIPTION: 抽 !${ModID}:DR! 張牌.若抽到的牌是 ${ModID}:命輪 , 則使其 [E] 消耗變為 0 , 否則將其一張附加 消耗 的原始複製置入手中.

${ModID}:GiveAndTake.NAME: Give and Take
${ModID}:GiveAndTake.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL After each active attack, gain !M! Thorns.

${ModID}:WhipOfMadness.NAME: Whip of Madness
${ModID}:WhipOfMadness.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !${ModID}:AC! times randomly and gain ${ModID}:Temporary Thorns equal to !M!% of the damage dealt.

${ModID}:WaxHotDesire.NAME: Wax Hot Desire
${ModID}:WaxHotDesire.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. In this turn, steal !${ModID}:M2! Strength from all enemies, If there is only 1 enemy, the stolen Strength is doubled. Remove all enemies' Thorns.
${ModID}:WaxHotDesire.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Thorns. In this turn, steal !${ModID}:M2! Strength from all enemies, If there is only 1 enemy, the stolen Strength is doubled. Remove all enemies' Thorns. Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus.

${ModID}:OutstandingVeteran.NAME: Outstanding Veteran
${ModID}:OutstandingVeteran.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL Gain !M! Dexterity. Damage of Strike increases with !${ModID}:M2! time{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of the current Block.

${ModID}:CombatStance.NAME: Combat Stance
${ModID}:CombatStance.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. If in hand when turn ends, the gained Block increases by !M!. Dispel ${ModID}:Seal. NL Counts as ${ModID}:Defend.

${ModID}:PrecisionSlash.NAME: Precision Slash
${ModID}:PrecisionSlash.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Each !M! Block increases damage by 1. In this turn, for every ${ModID}:Defend played, [E] Cost -1. NL Counts as Strike.

${ModID}:DefensiveStance.NAME: Defensive Stance
${ModID}:DefensiveStance.DESCRIPTION: Double your Block. NL Counts as ${ModID}:Defend.

${ModID}:InsightStrike.NAME: Insight Strike
${ModID}:InsightStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to the enemy with the highest HP and Block, and gain Block equal to !M!% of the damage dealt. NL Counts as Strike.

${ModID}:DanceOfTheGibbousMoon.NAME: Dance of the Gibbous Moon
${ModID}:DanceOfTheGibbousMoon.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL After playing !M! ${ModID}:Command_Card{!M!|>1=s}, heal !${ModID}:H! HP and gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Aliemus. After playing "Marvelous Cuisine", inflict !${ModID}:M3! stack{!${ModID}:M3!|>1=s} of Poison on all enemies.

${ModID}:ToadStew.NAME: Toad Stew
${ModID}:ToadStew.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Inflict !M! stack{!M!|>1=s} of Poison and !${ModID}:M2! turn{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} of Weak on all enemies, and heal for !${ModID}:H! HP. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.

${ModID}:SilentFealty.NAME: Silent Fealty
${ModID}:SilentFealty.DESCRIPTION: Heal !${ModID}:H! HP and gain !B! Block. If held when turn ends, [E] Cost increases by !M!, and both HP restoration and Block gain are doubled. Stacks up to !${ModID}:M2! times.

${ModID}:PainConversion.NAME: 疼痛轉化
${ModID}:PainConversion.DESCRIPTION: 易傷 自身, 本回合每受到一次主動攻擊, Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus.

${ModID}:UnexpectedGain.NAME: Unexpected Gain
${ModID}:UnexpectedGain.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose 1 card from Draw Pile and place into hand. !M!% chance to reduce [E] Cost by 1.
${ModID}:UnexpectedGain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Choose 1 card from Draw Pile and place into hand. !M!% chance to reduce [E] Cost by 1, !${ModID}:M2!% chance to reduce [E] Cost by 2.

${ModID}:Showdown.NAME: Showdown
${ModID}:Showdown.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 1 to !${ModID}:AC! times, gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. If 6 or more times of damage dealt, obtain !M! "Unexpected Gain" with [E] Cost of 0 and Exhaust added.
${ModID}:Showdown.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 1 to !${ModID}:AC! times, gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Each time damage is dealt, you gain an additional !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Aliemus. If 6 or more times of damage dealt, obtain !M! "Unexpected Gain" with [E] Cost of 0 and Exhaust added.

${ModID}:TenRingsPlay.NAME: Ten Rings Play
${ModID}:TenRingsPlay.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !${ModID}:AC! times. NL ${ModID}:Phantasm

${ModID}:LaudableMasterpiece.NAME: 此曲應得稱頌
${ModID}:LaudableMasterpiece.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus.回合開始時, 將一張「協樂的交響」置入手中.

${ModID}:SoulOverture.NAME: Soul Overture
${ModID}:SoulOverture.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Randomly deal !D! ${ModID}:Pierce_Damage !${ModID}:AC! time{!${ModID}:AC!|>1=s}. If used with 0 [E] Cost, deal an additional !${ModID}:M2! hit{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1
${ModID}:SoulOverture.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}Randomly deal !D! ${ModID}:Pierce_Damage !${ModID}:AC! time{!${ModID}:AC!|>1=s}. Each hit has a !M!% chance to randomly apply 1 ${ModID}:Marvelous_Debuff to the target. If used with 0 [E] Cost, deal an additional !${ModID}:M2! hit{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s}. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1

${ModID}:MemoryRondo.NAME: Memory Rondo
${ModID}:MemoryRondo.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add !${ModID}:M2! "Insight" to your hand. NL In you lack the required [E], you can still play this card, but it effect will be changed to shuffle !${ModID}:M2! "Insight" into Draw Pile.
${ModID}:MemoryRondo.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Add !${ModID}:M2! "Insight" to your hand. NL In you lack the required [E], you can still play this card, but it effect will be changed to gain !M! Strength and shuffle !${ModID}:M2! "Insight" into Draw Pile.

${ModID}:LawOfTheStrongest.NAME: Law of the Strongest
${ModID}:LawOfTheStrongest.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Remove Strength buffs from all enemies, restoring them at the start of the next turn.
${ModID}:LawOfTheStrongest.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. Steal Strength buffs from all enemies, restoring them at the start of the next turn.

${ModID}:GreatSacrifice.NAME: 偉大的犧牲
${ModID}:GreatSacrifice.DESCRIPTION: 易傷 自身,  ${ModID}:Delay:抽 !${ModID}:DR! 張牌.
${ModID}:GreatSacrifice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 易傷 自身, 抽 !${ModID}:DR! 張牌並使其獲得 ${ModID}:Temporary 保留.

${ModID}:LessonLearned.NAME: Lesson Learned
${ModID}:LessonLearned.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. If Fatal, Upgrade a random card in your deck.

${ModID}:DuskAndDawn.NAME: 極夜與破曉
${ModID}:DuskAndDawn.DESCRIPTION: 回合結束後獲得 200 ${ModID}:Keyflare.觸發 ${ModID}:死亡抵抗 後, 獲得 1000 ${ModID}:Keyflare.

${ModID}:HeartOfSilver.NAME: 純銀的初心
${ModID}:HeartOfSilver.DESCRIPTION: 釋放 ${ModID}:Posse 後, 獲得 !M! Strength 和 !B! Block.

${ModID}:AnnihilatedRebirth.NAME: 重生於湮土
${ModID}:AnnihilatedRebirth.DESCRIPTION: 釋放 ${ModID}:Exalt 後, 使 ${ModID}:Exalt 基礎傷害提高 !M! %,  Block 和生命回復提高 !${ModID}:M2! %.

${ModID}:SpringInAcushnet.NAME: 阿庫特之春
${ModID}:SpringInAcushnet.DESCRIPTION: 回合結束時Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus, 獲得等同於 ${ModID}:銀鑰充能 的 ${ModID}:Keyflare.

${ModID}:Sunfall.NAME: 殞日
${ModID}:Sunfall.DESCRIPTION: 造成的基礎傷害、 中毒 和 Thorns 提高 !M! %.

${ModID}:BirthOfASoul.NAME: 靈魂誕生
${ModID}:BirthOfASoul.DESCRIPTION: 造成的基礎治療 和 Block 提高 !${ModID}:M2! %.打出「 打擊 」後, 回復 !${ModID}:H! %已損失生命.打出「 ${ModID}:防禦 」後, 獲得 !B! %當前生命的 Block.該效果每回合最多各觸發 !${ModID}:M3! 次.
${ModID}:BirthOfASoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Passive:生命上限提高 !M! %. NL 造成的基礎治療 和 Block 提高 !${ModID}:M2! %.打出「 打擊 」後, 回復 !${ModID}:H! %已損失生命.打出「 ${ModID}:防禦 」後, 獲得 !B! %當前生命的 Block.該效果每回合最多各觸發 !${ModID}:M3! 次.

${ModID}:RewindingTime.NAME: Rewinding Time
${ModID}:RewindingTime.DESCRIPTION: {@@}After playing a ${ModID}:Command_Card, return it to your hand from the Discard Pile, This effect can only trigger !${ModID}:M2! time{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} per turn. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.
${ModID}:RewindingTime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: {@@}${ModID}:Passive: ${ModID}:Keyflare_Regen +!M!. NL After playing a ${ModID}:Command_Card, return it to your hand from the Discard Pile, This effect can only trigger !${ModID}:M2! time{!${ModID}:M2!|>1=s} per turn. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.

${ModID}:CelestialBeast.NAME: 星天之獸
${ModID}:CelestialBeast.DESCRIPTION: 「 打擊 」和「 ${ModID}:Exalt 」基礎傷害提高 !M!.打出「 打擊 」後, 獲得 !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength , 每回合最多 !${ModID}:M3! 次.
${ModID}:CelestialBeast.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 「 打擊 」和「 ${ModID}:Exalt 」基礎傷害提高 !M!.打出「 打擊 」後, 獲得 !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength , 每回合最多 !${ModID}:M3! 次, 第 !${ModID}:M3! 次改為獲得 !${ModID}:M2! Strength.

${ModID}:HeartOfAKnight.NAME: 騎士之心
${ModID}:HeartOfAKnight.DESCRIPTION: 「 ${ModID}:Exalt 」造成的 Block 提高 !M! %.釋放「 ${ModID}:Exalt 」後, 獲得等同於當前 Block !${ModID}:M2! %的 ${ModID}:Temporary Strength.若處於 脆弱 狀態, 效果翻倍.

${ModID}:DeathlessAscent.NAME: 超越死亡
${ModID}:DeathlessAscent.DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:指令卡 造成的基礎治療 提高 !M! %.釋放「 ${ModID}:Exalt 」後, Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus, 若處於 易傷 狀態, 效果翻倍.

${ModID}:DreamOfTheSea.NAME: 海之夢
${ModID}:DreamOfTheSea.DESCRIPTION: 打出卡牌後, Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus.回合開始時, 獲得 !${ModID}:M3! Strength , 若當前 ${ModID}:界域 為「 ${ModID}:深海 」, 額外獲得 !${ModID}:M4! ${ModID}:觸腕傷害.
${ModID}:DreamOfTheSea.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Passive:獲得 !M! Strength , 若當前 ${ModID}:界域 為「 ${ModID}:深海 」, 額外獲得 !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:觸腕傷害. NL 打出卡牌後, Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus.回合開始時, 獲得 !${ModID}:M3! Strength , 若當前 ${ModID}:界域 為「 ${ModID}:深海 」, 額外獲得 !${ModID}:M4! ${ModID}:觸腕傷害.

${ModID}:ManikinOfOblivion.NAME: Manikin of Oblivion
${ModID}:ManikinOfOblivion.DESCRIPTION: Base ${ModID}:Aliemus, Base Poison, and Base HP healing effects are increased by !${ModID}:M2!%. NL After unleashing ${ModID}:Exalt, gain ${ModID}:Aliemus equal to 20% of the ${ModID}:Aliemus consumed. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.
${ModID}:ManikinOfOblivion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Passive: ${ModID}:Aliemus_Regen +!M!. NL Base ${ModID}:Aliemus, Base Poison, and Base HP healing effects are increased by !${ModID}:M2!%. NL After unleashing ${ModID}:Exalt, gain ${ModID}:Aliemus equal to 20% of the ${ModID}:Aliemus consumed. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.

${ModID}:HandOfOblivion.NAME: Hand of Oblivion
${ModID}:HandOfOblivion.DESCRIPTION: Place 1 "Strike" into your hand. Base Damage of Strike +!${ModID}:M2!%. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.
${ModID}:HandOfOblivion.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ${ModID}:Passive: Base Damage of Strike +!M!%. NL Place 1 "Strike" into your hand. Base Damage of Strike +!${ModID}:M2!%. NL ${ModID}:Prepare 1.

${ModID}:Insight.NAME: Insight
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Adv. Insight

${ModID}:SilverKeyDawn.NAME: Silver Key Gleam
${ModID}:SilverKeyDawn.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from !M! random ${ModID}:Posse, trigger its effect immediately.
${ModID}:SilverKeyDawn.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 from !M! random ${ModID}:Posse, trigger its effect twice immediately.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Silver Key Dawn

${ModID}:InnocentReturnGift.NAME: Innocent Return Gift
${ModID}:InnocentReturnGift.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Exhaust after !M! use in Boss Battle.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Exhaust after !M! use in Boss Battle. NL !stslib:ex! remaining.

${ModID}:MutatedHeart.NAME: Mutated Heart
${ModID}:MutatedHeart.DESCRIPTION: Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + !${ModID}:DR!.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + !${ModID}:DR!. Exhaust after !M! use in Boss Battle.
Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + !${ModID}:DR!. In Boss Battle, reduce [E] Cost of drawn cards by !${ModID}:M2! and Exhaust after !M! use.
Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + !${ModID}:DR!. Exhaust after !M! use in Boss Battle. NL !stslib:ex! remaining.

Discard all your cards, then draw a number of cards equal to the number of discarded cards + !${ModID}:DR!. In Boss Battle, reduce [E] Cost of drawn cards by !${ModID}:M2! and Exhaust after !M! use. NL !stslib:ex! remaining.

${ModID}:MarvelousCuisine.NAME: Marvelous Cuisine
${ModID}:MarvelousCuisine.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Exhaust after !${ModID}:M3! use. NL ${ModID}:Echo.
${ModID}:MarvelousCuisine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. There is a !${ModID}:M2!% chance to trigger a ${ModID}:Marvelous_Buff. NL Exhaust after !${ModID}:M3! use. NL ${ModID}:Echo.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E]. NL Exhaust after !${ModID}:M3! use. NL !stslib:ex! remaining. NL ${ModID}:Echo.
Gain [E]. There is a !${ModID}:M2!% chance to trigger a ${ModID}:Marvelous_Buff. NL Exhaust after !${ModID}:M3! use. NL !stslib:ex! remaining. NL ${ModID}:Echo.

${ModID}:OctahedronDice.NAME: Octahedron Dice
${ModID}:OctahedronDice.DESCRIPTION: Roll a 6-sided dice, gain ${ModID}:Temp Strength equal to the dice roll ×!M!%. If the roll is 4 or higher, Inflict Weak on all enemys for 1 turn. If the roll is 6 or higher, doubled the gained ${ModID}:Temp Strength.
${ModID}:OctahedronDice.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Roll a 6-sided dice, gain ${ModID}:Temp Strength equal to the dice roll ×!M!%. If the roll is 4 or higher, Inflict Weak and Vulnerable on all enemys for 1 turn. If the roll is 6 or higher, doubled the gained ${ModID}:Temp Strength and gain [E] .
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Shining Octahedron Dice

${ModID}:SymphonyOfHarmony.NAME: Symphony of Harmony
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: Ascending Scale
The next ${ModID}:Command_Card you play has +2 [E] Cost, and take effect twice.
Descending Scale
The next ${ModID}:Command_Card you play has it [E] Cost reduced by 2

${ModID}:UtopianVeil.NAME: Utopian Veil
${ModID}:UtopianVeil.DESCRIPTION: View 3 uncarried ${ModID}:Posse, choose 1 to release immediately. Gain [E] , dispel your own Poison , ${ModID}:Sealed , ${ModID}:Stagnation state.

${ModID}:FaithOfTheDivineRealm.NAME: Faith of the Divine Realm
${ModID}:FaithOfTheDivineRealm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. Weak and Vulnerable all enemies for 1 turn.

${ModID}:SymptomDelusion.NAME: Symptom: Delusion
${ModID}:SymptomDelusion.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, gain [E] [E]. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomEpilepsy.NAME: Symptom: Epilepsy
${ModID}:SymptomEpilepsy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Lose !M! HP, draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomMadness.NAME: Symptom: Madness
${ModID}:SymptomMadness.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, gain !${ModID}:A! ${ModID}:Aliemus. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomWeakness.NAME: Symptom: Weakness
${ModID}:SymptomWeakness.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of the turn, if in hand, gain Weak for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}. After use, apply Weak to all enemies for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomBreakdown.NAME: Symptom: Breakdown
${ModID}:SymptomBreakdown.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of the turn, if in hand, gain Frail for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}. After use, apply Vulnerable to all enemies for !M! turn{!M!|>1=s}. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomClaustrophobia.NAME: Symptom: Claustrophobia
${ModID}:SymptomClaustrophobia.DESCRIPTION: Lose !M! HP, gain double that amount in Block. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomSomniloquy.NAME: Symptom: Somniloquy
${ModID}:SymptomSomniloquy.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s} and add !M! "Symptom: Somniloquy" to the Discard Pile. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomHysteria.NAME: Symptom: Hysteria
${ModID}:SymptomHysteria.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] and add !M! "Symptom: Hysteria" to the Discard Pile. NL Unremovable In Shop.

${ModID}:SymptomObedience.NAME: Symptom: Obedience
${ModID}:SymptomObedience.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, if in hand, !M! random ${ModID}:Symptom_Card will be added to the Draw Pile.

${ModID}:Wound.NAME: Wound
${ModID}:Wound.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Take !M! damage. draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}. NL Removed When Discarded.

${ModID}:Suffocation.NAME: Suffocation
${ModID}:Suffocation.DESCRIPTION: {@@}At the end of the turn, if in hand, gain !M! stack{!M!|>1=s} of Poison.

${ModID}:PainOfUnfulfilledDesires.NAME: Pain of Unfulfilled Desires
${ModID}:PainOfUnfulfilledDesires.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Deal !M! damage to self. Gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength, draw !${ModID}:DR! card{!${ModID}:DR!|>1=s}.

${ModID}:CryOut.NAME: Cry Out
${ModID}:CryOut.DESCRIPTION: Reduce all enemies' !M! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength and place !${ModID}:M2! "Symptom: Delusion" into your hand.
${ModID}:CryOut.FLAVOR: Does it hurt? So pitiful...Just cry it out!

${ModID}:Unrestrained.NAME: Unrestrained
${ModID}:Unrestrained.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength . All enemies gain !${ModID}:M2! ${ModID}:Temporary Strength. NL ${ModID}:Persistent. ${ModID}:Destroy.
